abstract: A three-judge panel for a federal appeals court overturned the conviction of Gregory L. Reyes, ex-chief of Brocade Communications, and ordered a new trial, citing prosecutorial misconduct.
snippet: A three-judge panel for a federal appeals court overturned the conviction of Gregory L. Reyes, ex-chief of Brocade Communications, and ordered a new trial, citing prosecutorial misconduct.
lead_paragraph: Update | 4:39 p.m. A three-judge panel for a federal appeals court on Tuesday overturned the conviction of Gregory L. Reyes, the former chief executive of Brocade Communications, on charges of illegally backdating stock options. The judges ordered a new trial, citing misconduct by prosecutors.

byline.original: By Michael J. de la Merced
